summary:
Currently working as a Software Engineer in Eindhoven for ASML (via Akka Technologies). Specialized in C/C++ and Python development for a wide domain of applications.
Working as Dev-Ops focused engineer for migration project, mainly focusing on the Backend of tooling for SCM.
Worked as Algorithm Software Engineer, developing cutting-edge technologies in the ADAS domain generally and specifically in path search for different levels of autonomous driving.
Experienced in systems engineering for automotive software, requirements management, module design and architectural overview of applications.
R&D test-driven software implementation on embedded systems in Agile, Scrum environment guided by the V-Model methodology.
Research-oriented, worked as postgraduate research and teaching assistant, and an undergraduate researcher.
Master's research candidate working on the thesis in the field of autonomous driving.

education.field_of_study: Mechatronics, Robotics, Automotive and Automation Engineering

certifications.name: Shortest Paths Revisited, NP-Complete Problems and What To Do About Them
State Estimation and Localization for Self-Driving Cars
Greedy Algorithms, Minimum Spanning Trees, and Dynamic Programming
Graph Search, Shortest Paths, and Data Structures
Divide and Conquer, Sorting and Searching, and Randomized Algorithms

projects.title: Park4UHome
projects.description: Valeo's Project for Trajectory tracking, management, relocalization and execution autonomously

projects.title: ValetParking
projects.description: Valeo's project integrated with the garage environment, in a V2X fashion, to execute the vehicle's trajectory autonomously

projects.title: Park4U
projects.description: Valeo's automatic parking projects. Worked on different variants (FullAuto and SemiAuto) for different automotive manufacturers (VW, BMW, DAIMLER, Ford, HKM, PSA, JLR, Renault-Nissan, Tesla and Volvo). And contributed in development of demos.

projects.title: Autonomous Systems simulation
projects.description: Developing different variants of an environment for controlling connected autonomous mobile robots. Worked as a supervisor on different groups of bachelor students and undergraduates

projects.title: Autonomous Golf Cart
projects.description: Developing the autonomous driving algorithms for a pre-designed electric golf cart for simulation and implementation. Worked on system architecture, control algorithms development, low level execution and perception integration

projects.title: CNC Machine
projects.description: A prototype for a CNC machine. Worked as a software developer for the machine

projects.title: Localization ECU
projects.description: Development of the embedded environment on ARM targets to send and receive localization information. Worked on the service layer and interfacing the application layer for the CAN communication

projects.title: Solar Tracker
projects.description: Panels tracking the sun for maximum efficiency. Worked on developing the software and hardware environment for the tracking system

projects.title: Tennis Ball Launcher
projects.description: A portable ball launcher for tennis training. Worked on mechanical theory and design and the software development for controlling the system and it's user interface

projects.title: Production Line Prototype
projects.description: A prototype of a 3-stage production line (feeding, sorting and packaging). Worked as a full system designer for the feeding and sorting stages, including mechanical, hardware and software design, implementation and testing

courses.name: Essential Math for Machine Learning: Python
Software Design and Architecture Specialization (4 Courses)

profile_positions.description:
- Working on internal project, developing roadmaps and technical specifications
- Assist in the recruitment process and other aspects of organizational development
- Presenting software and automotive focused training and knowledge transfer sessions for other consultants
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Part-time ADAS developer for planning and control in autonomous driving functions.
- Integrating new releases for the overall vehicle software
- Participating in defining the vehicle's software architecture
- Contributing to the overall functional roadmap
- Designing and implementing SIL tests for all the vehicle's functions
- Debugging, fixing and reporting malfunctions in the software pre-releases and the respective submodules
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Design and implementation of functional change requests.
• Requirements management (using DOORS).
• Development of efficiency tools.
• Tests specifications design.
• Trainer, technical system trainings and knowledge transfer sessions for the other teams.
• Analysis of customer tickets.
• Ensuring 100% code coverage.
• 40% runtime optimizations.
• Contributions in unified navigation stack.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Development, implementation, analysis, and design of algorithm responsible for path search, grid map creation for low-speed driverless application.
• Development of algorithms for change requests in path search algorithms in a test-driven fashion.
• Contribution in platform software for demos and test environment.
• Development of automated testing frameworks, for data extraction from real-time bus interfaces and usage in HIL environment.
• Design and deployment of CI/CD pipeline.
• Integration of different algorithms software libraries.
• Analysis of KPIs on system-level, directly coupled with OEMs.
• Safety requirements analysis and safety case design.
profile_positions.title: Algorithm Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Development of software application modules for data passing and wrapping.
• Analysis of platform tickets and delegation/fixing detected bugs.
• Integration of in-house testing SIL, HIL and PIL tools.
• Development and analysis of application software responsible for ECU communication.
profile_positions.title: Junior Embedded Software Engineer

profile_positions.description: Requirements traceability management using DOORS, configurations of new peripherals for AUTOSAR environment and R&D initiative for automation scripts
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description:
Development and update of the experimental part of the Autonomous Systems course, tutoring ROS for undergraduate students, teaching assistant for autonomous systems' algorithms and functions.
Research in the field of autonomous navigation for scientific activities, research participation in different competitions representing the university.
Mentoring senior students with their graduation projects.
profile_positions.title: Research And Teaching Assistant

profile_positions.description: Software architecture and design role for automated driving project
profile_positions.title: Technical Lead
